name: NecroDungeon (Matteo Vera)
description:
Necromech is a Rogue-lite bullet hell developed as a student game. It is a submission to the Stout Game Expo.

Story:

The world has fallen to the NecroMechs. But not all have embraced their new robot skeleton overlords. Some rebels still wage war against the tyranny of the Diesel Gods and their steel servants.

Credits:

Mitchell Winnebrenner: Art
Matteo Vera: Programming. Voice Acting
Alec Jakopin: Programming, Sound Design. UI design
Effie Woode: Programming
Alabastard: Music
